# platform

**Type**

The platform on which the customer consumed the in-app purchase.

## Declaration

```swift
int32 platform
```

## Consumption Data Types

- **accountTenure**: The age of the customer’s account.
- **appAccountToken**: The UUID that you generate to associate a customer’s In-App Purchase with its resulting App Store transaction.
- **consumptionStatus**: A value that indicates the extent to which the customer consumed the in-app purchase.
- **customerConsented**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the customer consented to provide consumption data to the App Store.
- **deliveryStatus**: A value that indicates whether the app successfully delivered an in-app purchase that works properly.
- **lifetimeDollarsPurchased**: A value that indicates the dollar amount of in-app purchases the customer has made in your app, since purchasing the app, across all platforms.
- **lifetimeDollarsRefunded**: A value that indicates the dollar amount of refunds the customer has received in your app, since purchasing the app, across all platforms.
- **playTime**: A value that indicates the amount of time that the customer used the app.
- **refundPreference**: A value that indicates your preferred outcome for the refund request.
- **sampleContentProvided**: A Boolean value that indicates whether you provided, prior to its purchase, a free sample or trial of the content, or information about its functionality.
- **userStatus**: The status of a customer’s account within your app.
